ingredients.name: Roma Tomato
ingredients.notes: or any paste tomato, halved horizontally

ingredients.name: Poblano Pepper
ingredients.notes: or other hot pepper, seeded and quartered

steps.text: Heat broiler to high and place rack in top position.
Squeeze the tomato halves, reserving the juice and seeds.

Set aside 2 of the tomatoes. Toss the remaining 4 tomatoes with the garlic, poblanos, bell pepper, and red onion in a large bowl with the tablespoon of oil. Spread in a shallow roasting pan or sheet pan with a lip.
Broil for 20 minutes, stirring often for even browning.
Move the roasted vegetables to the work bowl of a food processor and add the reserved tomatoes, lime juice, kosher salt, and chili powder.
Pulse several times until mixture reaches salsa consistency. If mixture is too dry, add part or all of the reserved tomato juice.
Stir in cilantro and refrigerate 2 hours before serving.
